comment: Lecturing is hard to listen to and she just reads off the slides. Make sure to check the presenter notes because all the info is there. Test heavy, would not take again.

The test are extremely hard. Go by the PowerPoints and meet with her individually and she gives some good tips. She doesnt give good feedback on exam reviews. Study the PowerPoints and practice questions. This class is tough.

Speaks extremely soft, cannot be heard in a class of 100+ unless you sit in the front row. Does not wear mic. Reads directly off slides. PowerPoints are not organized, are extremely repetitive, and are super long.
